get_open_banking_v1_2_atms.title: This API will return data about all our ATMs and is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

get_x_open_banking_v1_2_atms_country__co.title: This extended API will return data about all ATMs in the specified country. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.
